Definitely will consider to stay here again when I visit Surabaya Few notes for improvement: - hotel rooms facing the street to be more sound-proved. We do experience awoken at night because of motorcycles revving at late midnight. - stabilize internet connection to improve reliability for guest to have working session from their room. - pool area to add signage no safeguards on duty since the pool is ranging between 1-3 meters. - breakfast room-check experience, on my 2nd day of stay (jun 28), I came to know both my room numbers (219-221) have been used by someone. So the person-in-charge claimed that I could not enter. But since I insist, so I'm allowed only that after putting the argument.

There were mosquitos in the room which didn't allow us to sleep at all on first night. Although later they took care of it using a spray, but apparently 1 night wasted completely. A very serious concern was that there were bats moving around in the swimming pool, touching the water every now and then. I asked for a quiet room which they gave on the back side of the hotel but apparently there was a disco club nearby and the music blasted till 4 AM. Not good if you are a light sleeper like me. Would not recommend. Location was good, plenty of places to explore nearby, shops, restaurants. Staff was welcoming, professional and helping. Room was pretty spacious.
